title: Whatsapp+ (Plus) v4.75 Mod (Patched)
description:
You can increase quality of pictures sent (by default resolution is decreased quite a lot)
You can share music just with one click
You can add contact profile pictures to their chats You can hide contact profile pictures and show phonebook pictures (in chat screen)
Built-in theme viewer and downloader. Check WhatsApp+ users themes online and apply theme if you like And more to come

What's new:

Version 4.75
Working with ART on KitKat 4.4.1 an up
Added MOD 2.1.7 Disable opening Settings when clicking on Chats header
Added MOD 2.1.8 to show own name instead of Chats in Main header
Added MOD 1.2.0G to add gradient color to chat background
Added MOD 1.2.12G to add gradient color for bottom background
General Contact Status copied to clipboard when clicking on it in Chat/Contact info screen
Other bugs solved

Remember to previously uninstall whatsapp if you come from the official version (if not you will get the "not installed" error)
Backup your ( /sdcard/Whatsapp ) folder before you unistall the official whatsapp.

Note: This is a patched version :D !! NO key file needed.

Enjoy!
